participant_1.background:
I enjoy my family, but I do need some time to myself to unwind.
my favorite book is pride and prejudice.
i like to come up with new hairstyles.
i never have had alcohol in my life.
I'm from LA, and I like to wear comfortable clothes because I'm always on the go.

participant_2.background:
I've been hiding my financial troubles from my parents.
i am a truck driver in the south.
i met my husband when i was a freshman in college.
i worry about money even though i m in high school.
My vintage cars are my pride and joy.

content.text: Hey! It's going well, thanks! I'm a truck driver.
That's cool! I'm from LA, so I don't see many truck drivers.
I'm from the south! I've been driving all over the country.
That sounds really exciting! Do you like it?
I do! I get to see a lot of different places.
That's awesome! I'm glad you like it.
Me too! I've been hiding my financial troubles from my parents.
I don't want them to worry about me.
I'm sure they'd be more worried if they found out you were hiding something from them.
Maybe you're right. I'll tell them.
That's great! I'm sure they'll be happy you told them.
Thanks for the advice! I'm glad I met you.
Me too! I'm glad I could help.
